answers.answer: Most of us who have experienced TSH levels that high have done so during cancer treatment.  Short term it just makes you feel horrible.  Long term, yes, it can be very serious.   Are you being treated by, or referred to, and endocrinologist?
No, I haven't been referred to one--my family dr. just gave me this news today---don't know yet what the plan of action will be
you need to be placed on thyroid replacement meds and referred to an endocrinologist ASAP (make sure the endo deals with thyroid problems - most deal with diabetes)

question: My TSH came back at an 87.  I haven't seen any other posts with this level---is this serious??????
title: high TSH number
